issue.summary: Possible rearrangement alt haplotype involving PLAG1
issue.status_text: We are attempting to anchor the fosmids describing the rearrangement to the reference in order to create an ALT_LOCI.
issue.description: Possible rearrangement alt haplotype exists near AC107376.7/AC107952.5 overlap
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Drop NCBI36 unlocalized scaffold NT_113908 b/c sole component is phase 1
issue.description: NCBI36 chr.8 unlocalized scaffold NT_113908 is comprised entirely of phase 1 sequence (AC145057.1).
issue.resolution_text: This scaffold/component is not included in GRCh37.

issue.summary: Drop NCBI36 unlocalized scaffold NT_113905 b/c sole component is phase 1
issue.description: NCBI36 chr.8 unlocalized scaffold NT_113905 is comprised entirely of phase 1 sequence (AC137085.2).
issue.resolution_text: This scaffold/component is not included in GRCh37.

issue.summary: Sequencing error (deletion) in 3' UTR of gene GPIHBP1 on AC138696.4
issue.description: The reference genome misses a "T" in the 3' UTR of gene GPIHBP1
issue.resolution_text: AC231965.2 has been added to the Chr. 8 Reference, replacing part of the sequence of component AC138696.4 in order to update the base at rs74198862 to the more common allele and better represent Gene ID: 338328 (GPIHBP1) for GRCh38.

issue.summary: Sequencing error (deletion) in 5' UTR of gene OTTHUMG00000164976 on AC138696.4
issue.description: The reference genome is missing a "C" in the 5' UTR of gene OTTHUMG00000164976
issue.resolution_text: This single nucleotide indel found in Chr. 8 component AC138696.4 does not have a severe functional consequence and has not been updated for GRCh38.

issue.summary: Sequence error (deletion) in 5' UTR of geneLYNX1 in AC083841.9
issue.description: The reference genome is missing "CC" in the 5' UTR of geneLYNX1
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF459649.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 8 Reference to update these bases to the more common allele and improve representation for GeneID: 66004 (LYNX1).

issue.summary: Sequence error (deletion) in 3' UTR of gene TRAPPC9
issue.status_text: Requested verification of the position of the discrepancy.
issue.description: The reference genome is missing a "G" in the 3' UTR of gene TRAPPC9 at exon 10 splice acceptor
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Sequence error (deletion) in coding exon of gene UBXN8
issue.description: The reference genome is missing a "T" from a coding exon 7 of gene UBXN8, causing frameshift and NMD
issue.resolution_text: This ticket reports the same issue being tracked in HG-326. Further work to resolve this issue will be reported in HG-326.

issue.description: Much of RefSeq NM_031308.1 (EPPK1) has no alignment to the reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: Reference component AC105049.5 has been replaced with fosmid AC234917.3, which has a much better alignment to RefSeq NM_031308.1 (EPPK1).

issue.summary: Two 6bp deletions in coding exons of PRAGMIN gene
issue.description: Reference genome is missing two pairs of codons from two exons of the PRAGMIN gene
issue.resolution_text: WGS contigs ABBA01026926.1 and AEKP01060802.1 have been added to the Chr. 8 Reference to update these two 6bp deletions to the more common insertion allele and improve representation for GeneID: 157285 (PRAGMIN) in GRCh38.

issue.description: Chromosome 8 sequence does not extend into the q telomeric repeat.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: Chromosome 8 sequence does not extend into p telomeric repeat.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC133883.6 and AC142398.2
issue.resolution_text: AC133883 has been removed as possibly deleted, and AC234640 spans the gap between AC025839 and AC142398.

issue.description: There is a Reference Assembly gap between AC233271.2 and AC232308.2. This ticket tracks the continued effort to close the gap reported in HG-719.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: There is a Reference Assembly gap between components AC138681.3 and AC233269.2. This ticket tracks the continued effort to close the gap reported in HG-724.
issue.resolution_text: WGS contig AUXG01000063.1 spans the gap between Chr. 8 components AC138681.3 and AC233269.2 for GRCh38.

issue.status_text: The gap flanking components each terminate in unresolved tandem repeat. We are unable to sequence through this repeat with current technologies and have exhausted all other options. Efforts to close this gap are now stalled.
issue.description: There is a Reference Assembly gap between components AC093331.9 and AC232323. This ticket tracks the continued effort to close the gap reported in HG-725.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: Several clones have been selected for sequencing that align near theAC019257.3 - AC115485.3 region of Chr. 8. These may be used to improve the reference or to represent an alternate haplotype.
issue.resolution_text: This CH17 path has replaced the reference in the region referred to in HG-19 and appears to represent an inversion haplotype.

issue.description: Several clones have been selected for sequencing that align near the AC105091.3 - AC136365.5 in Chr. 8. These may be used to improve the reference or to represent an alternate haplotype.
issue.resolution_text: This CHORI-17 pathway has been added as an ALT_LOCI to provide representation for a deletion allele relative to the reference involving population stratified gene (ADAM5P).

issue.summary: Can unlocalized scaffold NT_113907 be localized for GRCh38?
issue.description: Chr. 8 unlocalized scaffold NT_113907.1 (GL000197.1), comprised of component AC144571.1 requires localization.
issue.resolution_text: Unlocalized Chr. 8 component AC144571.1 has been removed from the reference as it was found to be redundant with reference components AP008236 through AC087363.

issue.status_text: There are a few clones being sequenced near this region. The placement of this gene will be re-analyzed once these clones are finished.
issue.description: GeneID: 440053 (LOC440053) possibly missing from assembly
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Assembly component AC040978.8 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.description: Assembly component AC040978.8 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.resolution_text: The sequence of AC040978.8 will be used through its overlap with AC021744.14 to capture this 1kG ph1 decoy sequence in GRCh38.

issue.summary: Assembly component AC090739.13 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.description: Assembly component AC090739.13 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.resolution_text: The sequence of AC090739.13 will be used through its overlap with AC093367.9 to capture this 1kG ph1 decoy sequence in GRCh38.

issue.resolution_text: The sequence of AF067845.1 will be used through its overlap with AC110288.10 to capture this 1kG ph1 decoy sequence in GRCh38.

issue.description: Report of a NM_001495.4 spanning a contig gap. No exons are missing from the RefSeq.
issue.resolution_text: PCR product AP008236.2 spans this gap.

issue.summary: Assembly component AC104995.4 contains a possible erroneous inversion
issue.description: Assembly component AC104995.4 contains a possible erroneous inversion.
issue.resolution_text: Assembly component AC104995.4 has been replaced with fosmids that contain the correct orientation of this inverted piece of sequence.

issue.resolution_text: An ALT_LOCI has been created to capture sequence from AC011198.2 present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly.

issue.resolution_text: AP000073.1 has an alignment to NC_000008.10 components AC090453.4-AC092818.4 with 99.8% Coverage and 99.4%ID, so this decoy sequence is considered captured for GRCh38.

issue.description: ESP analysis suggests the reference chromosome contains an inversion between AC022257.19 and AC133633.5
issue.resolution_text: The following clones correct a deletion found in GRCh37 chromosome NC_000008.10, in component AC133633.5: AC090141.9, AC242829.2, and AC240838.2.

issue.description: AC091175 RP11-146E23 may be deleted
issue.resolution_text: Fosmid clones AC144699.1, AC142447.3, and AC145430.2 correct a deletion found in NC_000008.9 component AC091175.11

issue.summary: Updating switch points to eliminate rare/erroneous bases from reference assembly
issue.description: Updating switch points to provide an early switch to AC090994.8 to avoid inclusion of several potentially erroneous (or very rare) bases found in AF130343.2
issue.resolution_text: The sequence of AC090994.8 will be used through its overlap with AF130343.2 for GRCh38 to avoid inclusion of several potentially erroneous (or very rare) bases found in AF130343.2

issue.status_text: Several CHORI-17 clones have been selected for sequencing.
issue.description: ESP analysis suggests the reference chromosome contains an inversion between AC130360.4 and AC068587.16
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: NM_207414.2 retains a mismatch vs GRCh38 resulting in a premature stop codon at this position and an NMD candidate.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC015528.14
issue.description: Analysis of GU266811.1, along with alignment of HuRef chr. 8, suggest there may be ~5kb sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC015528.14. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC022716.13
issue.description: Analysis of GU266841.1, GU267014.1, and GU267351.1 along with alignment of HuRef chr. 8, suggest there may be ~1775 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC022716.13. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113906 (component: AC142402.2) has an alignment to existing sequence in reference chr. 8
issue.resolution_text: NT_113906 (AC142402.2) has been verified as redundant and will not be used in the assembly.

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC104989.11
issue.description: Analysis of GU266980.1 and GU268800.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 8, suggest there may be ~842 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC104989.11. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC113145.7
issue.status_text: This discrepancy is being investigated to determine whether it may be variation.
issue.description: Analysis of GU268990.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 8, suggest there may be ~2,967 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC113145.7. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC090186.7
issue.description: Analysis of GU268067.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 8, suggest there may be ~2,425 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC090186.7. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AP002981.2
issue.description: Analysis of GU267373.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 8, suggest there may be ~1,081 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AP002981.2. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC079098.5
issue.status_text: This discrepancy looks like variation and will be considered for ALT representation.
issue.description: Analysis of GU268654.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 8, suggest there may be ~1,954 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC079098.5. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC100807.5
issue.description: Analysis of GU267285.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 8, suggest there may be ~857 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC100807.5. This may represent variation or an assembly error.

issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113906 (component: AC142402.2) has an alignment to existing sequence in reference chr. 8
issue.resolution_text: NT_113906 (AC142402.2) has been verified as redundant and will not be used in the assembly.

issue.summary: Possible Inversion in reference component AC107943.4
issue.description: There may be an inversion within AC107943.4
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: Possible haplotype expansion surrounding the gap between AC145291.2 and AC110280.8
issue.resolution_text: AC110280.8 has been removed from the TPF as possibly deleted. We have sequenced AC233992.5, and it spans the gap. NM_032450.2 (KIAA1833) supports the new pathway.

issue.description: Possible duplication of sequence on these two accessions, which are located on opposite sides of an assembly gap. Acc2 flanks gap, acc1 does not.
issue.resolution_text: AC110280.8 has been removed from the TPF as possibly deleted. We have sequenced AC233992.5, and it spans the gap. NM_016458.2 (C8orf30A) supports the new pathway.

issue.description: Possible haplotype expansion surrounding the gap between AC145291.2 and AC110280.8
issue.resolution_text: AC110280.8 has been removed from the TPF as possibly deleted. We have sequenced AC233992.5, and it spans the gap. NM_001080514.1 (SCXB) supports the new pathway.

issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113906 (component: AC142402.2) has an alignment to existing sequence in reference chr. 8
issue.resolution_text: NT_113906 (AC142402.2) has been verified as redundant and will not be used in the assembly.

issue.description: Sequence discrepancy between NM_024410.2 (ODF1) and the genomic sequence to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: The RefSeq has been updated to NM_024410.3 and now matches the reference.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_006158.2 (NEFL) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF495714.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 8 Reference to correct this base and improve representation for GeneID: 4747 (NEFL) in GRCh38.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by transcript NM_006904.6 and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF511073.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 8 Reference to update this base to the more common allele and improve representation for GeneID: 5591 (PRKDC) in GRCh38.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_003129.3 (SQLE) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: PCR product FJ695197 has been submitted as a patch for this error.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_005671.2 (UBXD6) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF459648.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 8 Reference to update this base to the more common allele and improve representation for GeneID: 7993 (UBXD6) in GRCh38.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_004260.2 (RECQL4) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF495717.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 8 Reference to update this base to the more common allele and improve representation for GeneID: 9401 (RECQL4) in GRCh38.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_021623.1 (PLEKHA2) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF495718.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 8 Reference to update this base to the more common allele and improve representation for GeneID: 59339 (PLEKHA2) in GRCh38.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_033225.4 (CSMD1) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: PCR product FJ695212 has been submitted as a patch for this error.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_022749.5 (FAM160B2) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: AC091171.14 has been updated to AC091171.15. The new version does not contain this discrepancy.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_024815.3 (NUDT18) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: AEKP01061801.1 has been added to the Chr. 8 Reference to patch component AC105206.8, updating two bases to the more common allele and improving representation for GeneID: 79873 (NUDT18) in GRCh38.

issue.description: There is a sequence discrepancy between RefSeq NM_001099670.1 (C8orf59) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF573693.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 8 Reference to update this 6nt deletion to the more common insertion allele and improve representation for GeneID: 401466 (C8orf59) in GRCh38.

issue.status_text: AC131901 was added as an ALT_LOCI to capture 1kG ph1 decoy sequence. It spans the AF067845-AC005010 join and describes a ~13kb deletion vs AC005010.
issue.description: ESP analysis suggests the reference chromosome contains an insertion between AF067845.1 and AC005010.2
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_052886.2 (MAL2) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF495716.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 8 Reference to correct this base and improve representation for GeneID: 114569 (MAL2) in GRCh38.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_152413.2 (GOT1L1) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: PCR product FJ695190 has been submitted as a patch for this error.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_001077527.1(JRK) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: The switchpoints have been curated to use the sequence of AC108002.3 through this overlap, which represents RefSeq NM_001077527.1(JRK) without the functional discrepancy.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_152758.4 (YTHDF3) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF459652.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 8 Reference to correct this base and improve representation for GeneID: 253943 (YTHDF3) in GRCh38.

issue.summary: Discrepancy in the alignment of RefSeq for GeneID:26873 (OPLAH) to reference component AC109322.16
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_017570.2 (OPLAH) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF459651.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 8 Reference to update this base to the more common allele and improve representation for GeneID:26873 (OPLAH) in GRCh38.

issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between AC145110.2 and AC131254.5.
issue.resolution_text: Gap size has been updated.

issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between AC138681.3 and AC142471.2.
issue.resolution_text: Gap size has been updated.

issue.description: ESP analysis suggests the reference chromosome contains an insertion within AC113209.4
issue.resolution_text: The approximately 11kb insertion contained in component AC113209.4 is likely valid in RP11 based on RP11 whole genome read alignments, and no change will be made to the reference.

issue.summary: Unplaced contig NT_113909 appears redundant to reference chromosome sequence
issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113909 appears redundant to sequence on the reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: AC145060.2, which composed contig NT_113909, has been placed on the Chr. 8 TPF, correcting an error reported in HG-1699.

issue.summary: Unplaced contig NT_113904 may be redundant to the reference chromosome
issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113904 may be redundant to the reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: NT_113904 (AC105058.4) has been verified as redundant and will not be used in the assembly.

issue.summary: Unplaced contig NT_113903 may be redundant to the reference chromosome
issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113903 may be redundant to the reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: NT_113903 (AC091190.3) has been verified as redundant and will not be used in the assembly.

issue.status_text: This gap is likely caused by a potential inversion in the Beta Defensin region. No extensions were added for GRCh38 in this complicated region.

issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC145124.2 and AC144830.2

issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC105186.14 and AC129925.12
issue.resolution_text: PCR product AP008236.2 spans this gap.

issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC145110.3 and AC131254.5
issue.resolution_text: AP008237, a PCR product from the Keio BAC library, spans this gap.

issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC138681.3 and AC142471.3
issue.resolution_text: AC233269.2 has been sequenced and extends into this gap for GRCh37. Further gap closure efforts will be tracked in HG-1315.

issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC093331.9 and AF279874.3
issue.resolution_text: AC232323.2 has been sequenced and extends into this gap for GRCh37. Further gap closure efforts will be tracked in HG-1318.

issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC073385.14 and AC145210.3
issue.resolution_text: Fosmid AC232275.2 has been sequenced and spans this gap.

issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC145291.3 and AC110280.8
issue.resolution_text: This issue is a duplicate of issue HG-243. Please see JIRA issue HG-243 for all future updates regarding this issue.

issue.status_text: Several CHORI-17 clones have been selected for sequencing in this region.
issue.description: Gaps in Chr8 genomic sequence due to defensin genes
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the protein encoded by RefSeq NM_207411.4 (XKR5) and the genomic region to which it aligns (AF233439.7).
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF495715.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 8 Reference to update this base to the more common allele and improve representation for GeneID: 389610 (XKR5) in GRCh38.

issue.summary: single base genomic deletion in 5' UTR of CPNE3 gene
issue.description: single deletion of a C in genome in 5' UTR of CPNE3 gene, not supported by any transcipts.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF459650.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 8 Reference to update this base to the more common allele, potentially improving representation of Gene ID: 8895 (CPNE3) in GRCh38.

issue.description: GRCh37 has a "T" at NC_000008.10:142505038 (rs6578193), which may affect the splicing of FLJ43860 (NM_207414.2).
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF459654.2 has been generated and added to the Chr. 8 reference to update a base in component AC138647.6 to the more common allele, representing Gene ID: 389690 (MROH5) with consensus splice sites in GRCh38.

issue.summary: Possible HuRef WGS to fill Chr.8 gap between AC073385.14 and AC145210.3
issue.description: Sequence from HuRef WGS contig NW_001839142.2 may span the gap in Reference chromosome 8 between AC073385.14 and AC145210.3.
issue.resolution_text: Fosmid AC232275.2 has been sequenced and spans this gap.

issue.summary: Possible missing sequence in assembly in region of component AC109322.16
issue.description: GRCh37 may be missing ~20kb sequence in the vicinity of AC109322.16
issue.resolution_text: Fosmid clone AC206437.3 corrects a deletion found in GRCh37 chromosome NC_000008.10, in component AC109322.16
